item.title: [Python] What I have learned in the past year as an old man (age mismatch)
item.description: # Overview Write what you are learning every day as an elderly person. I am inspired by how younger generations are eager to learn technology. Since the front and Web systems are too various to be able to keep up with learning, I specialize in the fields of my interest. By the way, there is no organization theory or anything like that. Self-introduction Soon to be 50 years old (looks like “is that right?

item.title: [Python] Should I fix that copy and paste?
item.description: It's true that copy clones of source code are more reliable than code clones, but in many cases the existence of code clones often hurts us at the last minute. After the person in charge escaped, corrected the source code until late at night, and released it, in fact, I was told that “I’m making it with copy and paste, so please test all the other places again” and start over Is very, very sad.
